[DIALECT: en-GB|0.95] Hi there! How can I help you with your mortgage today?

Hello, I'm looking to get a new mortgage as a first-time buyer. I'm 22 years old and have an annual income of £45,000. The property I'm interested in is a townhouse on First Lane in Knutsford, Cheshire, and it's valued at £3 million. I'm looking for a 25-year mortgage with an initial 5-year fixed-rate deal. Can you please help me get started with the application?
